results.firPara: Sergio Aguero and the substitute Nolito scored two apiece as City made it 11 goals in their first week under Pep Guardiolas management
results.secPara: Sergio Aguero and the substitute Nolito scored two apiece as City made it 11 goals in their first week under Pep Guardiolas management
results.webTitle: Stoke City 1-4 Manchester City: Premier League – as it happened

results.firPara: José Mourinho hopes to make José Fonte his fifth major signing of the summer, with the Manchester United manager keen to add the Southampton centre-backs experience to his squad.
results.secPara: Fonte is 32 and and is under contract at the south coast club until 2018. The Portuguese has been offered a new deal by Saints but has yet to agree terms.
results.webTitle: Manchester United’s José Mourinho wants to buy Southampton’s José Fonte

results.firPara: Zlatan Ibrahimovic is intent Manchester United should develop the monster mentality he learned from playing alongside players such as Fabio Cannavaro, Patrick Vieira and Gianluigi Buffon at Juventus earlier in his career.
results.secPara: Ibrahimovic scored both goals in Friday evenings 2-0 victory over Southampton at Old Trafford and so has struck in each of his three matches for United, his tally standing at four. United have started well, with a maximum six points, but Ibrahimovic wants to help his new team-mates – particularly the younger players – to elevate their focus and approach, the Swedish striker drawing on his own experience after joining Juve in 2004 aged 22.
results.webTitle: Zlatan Ibrahimovic aims to bring ‘monster mentality’ to Old Trafford

results.firPara: Tottenhams protracted pursuit of Georges-Kévin Nkoudou is close to completion after an agreement was finally reached with Marseille over the fee for the France under-21 winger.
results.secPara: Nkoudou had looked set to move to White Hart Lane last month, with the Cameroon forward Clinton Njie joining the French club on a season-long loan as part of the deal. But after initially agreeing a fee for a player who scored 10 goals in all competitions last season, the Tottenham chairman, Daniel Levy, attempted to restructure the deal despite Nkoudou having already completed his medical. Negotiations initially broke down, with Tottenhams head of recruitment, Paul Mitchell, announcing that he would leave his post in the meantime.
results.webTitle: Tottenham finally reach agreement over Georges-Kévin Nkoudou transfer

results.firPara: Crystal Palace have confirmed the signing of Christian Benteke from Liverpool. The 25-year-old Belgium striker signed a four-year contract on Saturday for an undisclosed fee thought to be in the region of £27m.
results.secPara: Benteke, who joined Liverpool from Aston Villa for £32.5m little more than a year ago, had a difficult first season at Anfield and it became clear he did not fit into Jürgen Klopps plans after he replaced Brendan Rodgers as the manager in October last year.
results.webTitle: Crystal Palace sign Liverpool’s Christian Benteke for £27m on four-year deal

results.firPara: • Swedish forward has three goals in his first two Premier League games
results.secPara: José Mourinho hailed Zlatan Ibrahimovics display as the Swede scored both goals in Manchester Uniteds victory against Southampton and the manager was also clear that his side could not have begun the season any better.
results.webTitle: José Mourinho hails Ibrahimovic’s form for Manchester United

results.firPara: The worlds most expensive player recovers from a poor start on his Old Trafford return to put in a performance that promises much
results.secPara: The worlds most expensive player recovers from a poor start on his Old Trafford return to put in a performance that promises much
results.webTitle: Paul Pogba shows he can play big part in José Mourinho’s revitalisation project | Jamie Jackson

results.firPara: Mauricio Pochettino has spelled out the importance that he attaches to ruthlessness at Tottenham Hotspur as Nabil Bentaleb trains away from the first-team squad and the manager prepares to face Andros Townsend, a player that he let go last season.
results.secPara: Thew Argentinian sold Townsend to Newcastle United at the end of January for £12m and the winger has since moved on to Crystal Palace for £13m; he and they are the visitors to White Hart Lane on Saturday afternoon.
results.webTitle: Nabil Bentaleb gets the Townsend treatment from Pochettino at Spurs

results.firPara: Antonio Contes frustrations with Chelseas inability to add significantly to their squad will not extend to expecting the club to overpay for medium-level players this summer, though the Italian is still hopeful his options will have been bolstered by the time the deadline passes at the end of August.
results.secPara: Chelsea had hoped to three or four major signings to supplement a squad which came 10th last season, their lowest finish under Roman Abramovich, and had initially hoped the bulk of their business would have been concluded well before the start of the Italians first Premier League campaign. However, only NGolo Kanté and Michy Batshuayi, for a combined £65.1m from Leicester City and Marseille respectively, have arrived to date.
results.webTitle: Antonio Conte’s transfer frustrations grow as deadline looms for Chelsea

results.firPara: David Moyes is confronting a central defensive problem after Lamine Koné declined Sunderlands offer of a new contract, reiterated his determination to leave Wearside as soon as possible and then reported for Friday morning training complaining of a mysterious back problem.
results.secPara: Along with his erstwhile defensive partner, Younès Kaboul, Koné was a big reason why Sunderland managed to avoid relegation under Sam Allardyce last season. Now, though, he is high on Evertons wanted list and Moyes has reluctantly given Kaboul permission to join Watford, with that transfer expected to be finalised shortly.
results.webTitle: Koné injury and Kaboul transfer leave Sunderland short of defenders
